name: A Baby Train - Role Play Game
name_original: A Baby Train - Role Play Game
description:
Baby Train is a super fun game for children simulating your little one as the train driver! Awesome and colorful animations make this app super cool one to have when your little one is around.

We have loaded the app with lots of nursery rhymes to be played in the train dashboard!

Some of the fun activities that your kid will love in the app includes:

- Be in the driver seat of a cool baby train
- Start and Stop the train.
- Make horn sound and be amused.
- Play nursery rhymes in the train dashboard.
- And much more!

The universal app is perfect for those with iPad whilst the iPhone version comes in handy whenever you need it.

Give it a try! You won't regret it!

Stay tuned! And please let us know if you have any suggestions for improvement
